directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.  Stir in broccoli and salt and cook until just tender.  Break up spaghettini and stir into the pot.  Cook 8 to 10 minutes more, until pasta is al dente.  Serve in bowls topped with a tablespoon of olive and some freshly ground pepper.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Broccoli Spaghetti Soup
